code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import userReducer from"./user/user.reducer";import cartReducer from"./cart/cart.reducer";import directoryReducer from"./directory/directory.reducer";import shopReducer from"./shop/shop.reducer";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage,whitelist:["cart"]};var rootReducer=combineReducers({cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer,user:userReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
